results.description: Andrew Balbirnie replaces the long-serving William Porterfield as captain of the Ireland Test and one-day international side.
results.shortTitle: Balbirnie named new Test & ODI captain
results.title: Andrew Balbirnie: Ireland name new Test & ODI captain as William Porterfield steps down

altText: Andrew Balbirnie is one of Ireland's top batsmen
Andrew Balbirnie is one of Ireland's top batsmen

results.description: Ireland will take on Sri Lanka, Oman and Papua New Guinea in the first round of next year's T20 World Cup in Australia.
results.shortTitle: Ireland to play Sri Lanka in World Cup
results.title: T20 World Cup: Ireland to play Sri Lanka, Oman & Papua New Guinea in first round

results.description: Ireland see off Namibia by 27 runs in Dubai to clinch third place in the ICC Twenty20 World Cup qualifying tournament.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Namibia to finish third
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifying: Ireland beat Namibia to finish third

results.description: Ireland fall short of their 159-run target as the Netherlands advanced to the final of the T20 World Cup qualifying tournament in Dubai.
results.shortTitle: Ireland lose to Dutch in Dubai
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Netherlands defeat Ireland by 21 runs in Dubai

results.description: Ireland qualify for the T20 World Cup in Australia next year as Group B winners after Jersey earn a shock 14-run win over Oman.
results.shortTitle: Ireland qualify for Twenty20 World Cup
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland qualify after Jersey earn shock win over Oman

results.description: Ireland face a wait to see if they qualify automatically for the T20 World Cup after comfortably beating Nigeria by eight wickets to move top of Group B.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Nigeria to go top of group
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland thrash Nigeria by eight wickets to move top of group

results.description: Ireland keep alive their hopes of reaching the T20 World Cup as they earn a dominant eight-wicket win over Jersey in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Jersey by eight wickets
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland maintain hopes with eight-wicket win over Jersey

results.description: Ireland's bid to qualify for the T20 World Cup finals suffers a setback as they lose to Canada by 10 runs in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Ireland lose to Canada in Qualifier
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland lose by 10 runs to Canada

results.description: Gareth Delany stars with the bat as Ireland beat Oman by 35 runs to stay in contention to qualify for next year's T20 World Cup finals.
results.shortTitle: Delany stars as Ireland see off Oman
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland beat Oman by 35 runs

results.description: Ireland lose by five wickets to hosts United Arab Emirates in their second match at the T20 World Cup Qualifier in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beaten by hosts UAE in qualifier
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland lose by five wickets to hosts UAE

results.description: Andrew Balbirnie scores an unbeaten 70 as Ireland beat Hong Kong by eight wickets in their opening T20 World Cup qualifier game in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Ireland ease past Hong Kong in opener
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland ease past Hong Kong by eight wickets in opener

results.description: Ireland begin the long quest for a place at next year's Twenty20 World Cup with an opening qualifier against Hong Kong on Friday in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: In-form Ireland begin T20 World Cup bid
results.title: Cricket: In-form Ireland begin bid for place at T20 World Cup finals

thumbnail.altText: Kevin O'Brien will be key to Ireland's hopes in the T20 World Cup qualifier tournament in Abu Dhabi
Kevin O'Brien will be key to Ireland's hopes in the T20 World Cup qualifier tournament in Abu Dhabi
Kevin O'Brien will be key to Ireland's hopes in the T20 World Cup qualifier tournament in Abu Dhabi

results.description: George Munsey's 86 helps Scotland beat Ireland by one run in the T20 World Cup qualifier warm-up game in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Scotland edge out Irish in warm-up game
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland edge out Ireland by one run in warm-up game

thumbnail.altText: George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game
George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game
George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game
George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game

results.description: Ireland beat the Netherlands by 30 runs in their Twenty20 World Cup Qualifier warm-up game in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Netherlands in T20 warm-up
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Ireland beat Netherlands by 30 runs in warm-up

results.description: Cricket Ireland chief Warren Deutrom expects Ireland to be invited to tour Pakistan in either 2020 or 2021.
results.shortTitle: Irish cricket bosses ponder Pakistan tour
results.title: Ireland bosses visit Pakistan to assess possible future tour to country

thumbnail.altText: Cricket Ireland chief executive Warren Deutrom has been in Pakistan for five days
Cricket Ireland chief executive Warren Deutrom has been in Pakistan for five days
Cricket Ireland chief executive Warren Deutrom has been in Pakistan for five days

results.description: Ireland's men defeat Nepal by 13 runs to move to the top of the table in the pentangular Twenty20 international series in Oman.
results.shortTitle: Bowlers rescue Ireland against Nepal
results.title: Twenty20: Ireland's bowlers to the rescue against Nepal

results.description: Kevin O'Brien is the first player to hit a Twenty20 century for Ireland - with 124 off 62 balls - as they beat Hong Kong in the five-team tournament in Oman.
results.shortTitle: O'Brien gets historic T20 century
results.title: Kevin O'Brien hits 124 as Ireland beat Hong Kong in Twenty20 international

results.description: Ireland lose by 43 runs to hosts Oman in their second match of the Twenty20 pentangular tournament in Muscat.
results.shortTitle: Ireland lose to hosts Oman in T20 series
results.title: Ireland lose to Oman by 43 runs in second Twenty20 international

results.description: Ireland beat the Netherlands by six wickets in their first match of the T20 Pentangular tournament at the Al Amerat Cricket Ground in Oman.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Netherlands by six wickets
results.title: Ireland beat Netherlands by six wickets in T20 opener

results.description: West Indies announce fixture dates and venues for a six-match limited-overs series against Ireland in January 2020.
results.shortTitle: Ireland to play WI in six-match series
results.title: Ireland to play West Indies in six-match series in January 2020
